title: Community Climate Champions Project
description: TakaCycle's community recycling drives in Ghana are at the heart of our efforts to turn waste management into a community-driven force for good fostering a culture of recycling.

title: The Captain Planet Project
description: Education is a powerful tool for change. Our workshops on waste segregation are designed to educate school kids (our heroes)  on the importance of proper waste management.

title: The TakaCash Project
description: TakaCash is an innovative recycling platform that allows individuals to exchange their recyclable waste for money while contributing to a larger environmental cause.

title: Smart Bin Implementation Project
description: Deploying IoT-enabled smart bins across major cities to optimize waste collection routes and improve recycling rates.

title: Community Composting Initiative
description: Converting organic waste into valuable compost through community-managed composting stations, supporting local urban farming.
